lead_paragraph: Belgium forward Eden Hazard is fit and available for Chelsea's trip to Bournemouth on Saturday after more than a month out with a hip injury, manager Guus Hiddink said.

headline.print_headline: Fit-Again Hazard Ready for Chelsea Return
headline.main: Fit-Again Hazard Ready for Chelsea Return
